p: Over time, the broad category of people of color has been broken down to recognize the unique circumstances of Black and Indigenous people. These groups have a longer and more brutal history in the United States, and topics are explored such as how the making of the concept American “wilderness” has impacted them (Taylor 2016). White allies have been featured on BGC as a way to demonstrate their importance in creating a stronger movement that helps elevate the causes of DQTBIPOC environmentalists.
